texts.text: Your form is invalid. Please check and correct it.
There is no tenant defined with name {0}
User {0} is not active and can not log in.
Role {0} will be deleted and unassigned from all assigned users.
This button immediately resets user specific permission settings and saves changes. The user will only have permissions from assigned roles.
It will be used when building links to this web site. It's needed for some tasks like building password reset links. Ex: http://mydomain.com/
A password reset link will be sent to your email to reset your password. If you don't get an email within a few minutes, please re-try.
Invalid user name or email address
This email is sent you to reset and re-create your password.
Please click the link below to reset your password:
This email is sent you to verify your email.
Please click the link below to verify your email address:
Please be sure you entered this page by clicking the link sent to your email. If this does not solve the problem, you can re-try to request a new password reset link.

Your email address is not confirmed. Please check your email and click the email confirmation link to activate your account. If you did not receive activation email, click the 'email confirmation' to request a new email.
Please be sure you entered this page by clicking the link sent to your email. If this does not solve the problem, you can re-try to request a new confirmation code.
Your email address is successfully confirmed.
Should change password on next login.
A link will be sent to your email to activate your email address. If you don't get an email within a few minutes, please re-try.
You can not register to the system!
Self user registration is disabled. Please contact the system administrator to register.
A confirmation mail sent to {0}. Please click link in the email in order to confirm your mail address.
Your account is waiting to be activated by system admin.
Allow users to register to the system.
If you disable this, users will only be added by admin using user management page.
New registered users are active by default.
If you disable this, new users will not be active (and can not login) until admin manually activates the account.
Assign to new users by default.
Static roles can not be deleted.
Tenant name can not be empty
Tenant name must be at least 2 chars, starts with a letter and continue with letter, number, dash or underscore.
You can select a JPG/JPEG/PNG file with a maximum {0}MB size.
Your profile picture could not be changed.
Picture size must be smaller than {0}MB. Please select another file.
You can only select JPG/JPEG file. Please select another file.
Please prove you are not a robot
You must prove that you are not a robot.
Unable to determine that you are not a robot.
Form is not valid. Please check and fix errors.
Can not change username of the admin.
We can not find the page you're looking for.
Welcome to ASP.NET Zero startup project!

In this demo, you can use the left menu to test the application. This dashboard page is just for demonstration, but all other pages and functionalities are fully implemented, working and ready for production. You can add/apply your business requirements on this startup project (or remove any functionality you don't need). Thus, you can have a signification time gain to immediately start your own project requirements.

Welcome to the application. You can use the menu to start using the application. If you don't see any menu item, probably you don't have permission to see any page. Consider asking a system administrator for permissions.
A password reset link sent to your e-mail address. Please check your emails.
An e-mail activation link sent to your e-mail address. Please check your emails.
Use security image question (captcha) on registration.
Please select one of the following tenants.
If you can not remember your password, {0}.
See Demo for Multi-Page Application version with ASP.NET MVC and jQuery.
Notice: There is also a Single-Page Application version built using ASP.NET MVC and AngularJs.
Manage editions and features of the application
Are you sure to delete the edition {0}?
This button immediately resets tenant-specific feature settings and saves changes. The tenant will only have features from assigned edition.
One or more feature values are not valid!
Are you sure to delete the language {0}?
Can not edit or delete default languages. You can only edit or delete the languages you added. But you can change texts of all languages.
Use organization units to organize users and entities
Select an organization unit to see members.
Are you sure to delete organization unit {0}?
Are you sure to remove user {0} from organization unit {1}?
This user is already in the organization unit!
Please confirm to move {0} to under {1}.
Note: This operation is performed by another user on behalf of this user.
You can back to your account here.
Can not make cascade impersonation. This is already an impersonated login!
Can not impersonate a host user from a tenant user!
Can not impersonate a user of a different tenant!
Impersonation token is invalid or expired!
This is not an impersonated login!
You can not link to same account!
You must change your password before linking this account!
Link to user {0} will be deleted.
Impersonation token is invalid or expired!
Welcome to UET.EGarden! Notification system is used to inform you for intended events. You can select which type of notifications you want to receive from the notification settings.
On a new user registered to the application.
A new user registered to the application. User name: {userName}, Email address: {emailAddress}.
This option can be used to completely enable/disable receiving notifications.
You completely disabled receiving notifications. You can enable it and select notification types you want to receive.
You can not delete own user account!
You can clear caches in application on this page.
You can see latest logs in this page or download all logs in a single zip file.
Allow tenants to register to the system.
If you disable this, tenants will only be added by admin using tenant management page.
New registered tenants are active by default.
If you disable this, new tenants will not be active (and can not login) until admin manually activates the account.
On a new tenant registered to the application.
A new tenant registered to the application. Tenancy name: {tenancyName}.
Resized picture size must be smaller than {0}KB. Please resize down and try again.
Please do not enter an email address for username.
Notice: Before changing the database connection string for a tenant, you should move the tenant database to the new location. Changing connection string does not move the tenant database.
Timezone setting changed. Click OK button to refresh page and changes to take effect.
You can not be a friend with yourself.
You have a new chat message
You don't have any friends. Write a username to above input box and click "Add Friend" button.
You don't have any blocked users. In order to block a friend, select a friend and select block from actions dropdown.

Write only username for same tenant users,
[tenancyName]\[userName] for other tenant's users

for example:
.\admin -> for host admin
Test\admin -> for test tenant's admin
admin -> for your tenant's admin
Chat is not enabled for you.
Chat is not enabled for tenant.
Hi, this is a test message. Please login with my account in a different browser and check out how chat feature works.
Chat with other tenants is not enabled for you.
Chat with other tenants is not enabled for tenant.
Chat with host is not enabled for you.
Chat with host is not enabled for tenant.
Could not complete the login operation.
You are not authorized to perform this operation.
Target user could not be found. It's probably deleted.
The user account has been locked out. Please try again later.
You should verify yourself to login. Please select a verification type. A code will be sent based on selected verification type.
Security code could not be sent!
You should be logged in first, in order to verify yourself! Probably, your login has been timed out. Please go to the login page and re-try it.
Please enter the verification code sent to you.
Enable user account locking on failed login attempts
Maximum number of failed login attempt count before locking the account
Allow to remember browser. If you allow this, users can select to remember browser to skip second time two factor login for the same browser.
User is locked for a while after a certain amount of failed login attempts.
Could not validate external user login
Leave empty to switch to the host
Please wait while confirming your email address...
If you are changing your own permissions, you may need to refresh page (F5) to take effect of permission changes on your own screen!
Select a JPG/JPEG/PNG/GIF file with a maximum of 30KB size and 139x35 pixel resolution.
Select a .css file with a maximum of 1MB size.
Size of the file exceeds allowed limits!
This tenant is allowed to have a maximum of {0} users.
Passwords must have at least one digit ('0'-'9').
Passwords must have at least one lowercase ('a'-'z').
Passwords must have at least one non-alphanumeric character.
Passwords must have at least one uppercase ('A'-'Z').
Passwords must be at least {0} characters.

Expiring edition must be a free edition

Your subscription will expire in {0} day(s).
Your trial period will expire in {0} day(s).

Free editions cannot have trial versions
Your operation might be timed out, please contact us if you already made the payment.

Scan this QR code with your mobile app

This page shows a few useful UI components those can be used in your application. Components in this page are implemented as full stack (includes the server side).
Check Metronic theme for more UI components

The field {0} must be a minimum length of {1}.

All tenants of {sourceEditionName} edition moved to {targetEditionName} edition.

Disable concurrent login for a user. If a user logins with a second device, the first session is automatically closed.
